ygData.subject: Re: About the items... worthy quests?
ygData.msgSnippet: Gee the whole line of crafted armor.. and you forgot Souldfire, of course that cant be sold :) Wes Lobdell, Note: I m not a Mac person, but you have to admit,
ygData.messageBody:
Gee the whole line of crafted armor.. and you forgot Souldfire, of course that cant be sold :)

Wes Lobdell,
Note: I'm not a Mac person, but you have to admit, the following is funny+ACEAIQ- :) And if you don't +ACI-get+ACI- it, then I guess the media hasn't soaked it for all its worth yet after all...
Quote: +ACI-Macintosh -- we might not get everything right, but
atleast we knew the century was going to end.+ACI-
-Woody Allen
------------------------
My all time favorite Oxymorons:
exact estimate, plastic silverware, genuine imitation, mud bath, original copy, student teacher, alone together, anarchy rules, bitter sweet, bankrupt millionaire, black light, butt-head, casual sex, clean dirt, coed sorority, cold as hell, computer jock, constant change, cowardly lion, curved line(according to the mathematical definition of a line), delibrate mistake, dry wine, earth angel(ok thats just going back a ways +ADs-), educational television, even odds, found missing, freezer burn, fresh cheese, full-length bikini, half full, half naked, hard water, hells angels, idiot savant, jumbo shrimp, less is more, and finally my all time
-----Original Message-----
From: Stauss, Aaron Aaron.Stauss+AEA-COMPAQ.com
To: 'EQ+AF8-Tinkering+AEA-onelist.com' EQ+AF8-Tinkering+AEA-onelist.com
Date: Wednesday, August 11, 1999 1:41 PM
Subject: RE: +AFs-EQ+AF8-Tinkering+AF0- About the items... worthy quests?


From: +ACI-Stauss, Aaron+ACI- Aaron.Stauss+AEA-COMPAQ.com

I agree...the quest system is quite irritating. I keep a
running list of all items in game and off my list there are only 54 items
one can receive from a quest mind you 8 of those are the monk
headband/sashes . To my knowledge the following quests are the only ones
worth doing for item rewards not faction fixes that one could conceivably
sell.

Brewer's compendium - glowing stein
Jewel quest - Ivandyr's hoop/midnight/mallet
Hollow skull quest - jeweled skull
Red V quest - Bullsmasher
Lens quest - staff of the observers
Trueshot quest - trueshot bow
Centaur quests - crafted armor

Did I miss any?
